articles.title: Man’s 8th DUI arrest is among Washington’s most extreme cases of chronic drunken driving
articles.description: Joseph Shaun Goodman's eighth DUI arrest places him among a small cohort of chronic drunk drivers. State lawmakers are considering a bill that would make cases like Goodman's felonies rather than misdemeanors. Goodman is set to appear in court Monday.
